articles.author: Shashank Mattoo
articles.title: Iran, Saudi Arabia among six new additions to Brics | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Iran, Saudi Arabia, Egypt, Argentina, Ethiopia and the United Arab Emirates will join existing members Brazil, Russia, India, China and South Africa
articles.content: NEW DELHI : Leaders of Brics countries on Thursday invited six more nations to join them in the groupings first expansion since 2010. Iran, Saudi Arabia, Egypt, Argentina, Ethiopia and the United Ara… [+3042 chars]
